scripts.check:api-client: echo 'Checking for api/client imports...' && (grep -r "from.*api/client" src --include='*.ts' --include='*.tsx' 2>/dev/null | grep -v 'api/client.ts' | grep -v 'api/index.ts' | grep -v 'api/hooks.ts' && (echo 'ERROR: api/client imports found (use web/src/api.ts instead)' && exit 1) || echo 'âœ“ No api/client imports found') || echo 'Note: grep not available, run manually: grep -r "from.*api/client" src'
